## Test Coverage Matrix

| API Category | Endpoint | Tested | Status | Notes |
|--------------|----------|--------|--------|-------|
| **Authentication** | `/v2/account` | âœ… | PASS | Credentials valid |
| **Account Data** | `/v2/account` | âœ… | PASS | All fields retrieved |
| **Market Data** | `/v2/stocks/{symbol}/quotes/latest` | âœ… | PASS | Real-time quotes working |
| **Market Data** | `/v2/stocks/{symbol}/bars` | âŒ | FAIL | Use IEX feed instead |
| **Trading** | `POST /v2/orders` | âœ… | PASS | Order placement working |
| **Trading** | `GET /v2/orders/{id}` | âš ï¸ | PARTIAL | Needs null handling |
| **Portfolio** | `/v2/positions` | âœ… | PASS | Position tracking works |
| **Trading** | `DELETE /v2/orders/{id}` | âœ… | PASS | Order cancellation works |

## API Endpoint Coverage

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
    â”‚                   â”‚
    â–¼                   â–¼

    â”œâ”€ âœ… POST /orders       â”œâ”€ âœ… GET /quotes/latest
```
